item.title: Oracle Moocs
item.description:
Oracle Moocs - Join me! Join me on Oracle’s Learning Library for a few moocs -
Databases for Developers I loved this course! Chris Saxon has so much energy and enthusiasm for databases, it’s infectious. This is a very basic introduction to RDBS and is appropriate for anyone :) Chris also has a fantastic youtube channel - see the intro to the course here
Introduction to PL/SQL See my GitHub repo for the course https://github.
